level.heading: Form of unsworn declaration.
level.text: An unsworn declaration under this chapter shall be in substantially the following form:

"I declare under penalty of perjury under the law of the District of Columbia that the foregoing is true and correct, and that I am physically located outside the geographic boundaries of the United States, Puerto Rico, the United States Virgin Islands, and any territory or insular possession subject to the jurisdiction of the United States.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-171 inserted quotation marks in the form.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-171, see notes under § 16-2331.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 6 of the Uniform Unsworn Foreign Declarations Act. See Vol. 14, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
